description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no. 2 (approved plans) pursuant to planning permission reference 192877FUL dated 22.08.2019 for 'Conversion of two self-contained flats into a single family dwellinghouse; part single and part two storey rear extension; single storey side/rear extension; conversion of existing garage into habitable space involving replacement of garage door with window; and conversion of roofspace into habitable space". Variation seeking installation of roof lantern to flat roof of single storey rear/side extension; replacement of windows to ground floor rear elevation with four-panel bi-fold doors; and rear patio
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of Planning Permission ref. 192877FUL dated 22/8/19.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with submitted drawing and supporting documentation: Marshall Priora Concrete Block Permeable paving document ref. 1901/P2/200, Existing and Proposed Site Plan 1901_P2_30A, Revised Proposed Elevation drawing no.1901_P2_20C, Proposed Ground Floor Plan drawing no. 1901_P2_50A, Proposed First Floor Plan drawing no. 901_P2_60A, Proposed Loft Floor Plan drawing no. 901_P2_70B and Proposed Ground floor with patio detail drawing no.1901/P2/30B
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| The proposed roof lights on the rear and side roof slopes hereby approved shall only be constructed in a conservation style.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surrounding, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012), policies HC1 Draft New London Plan (2019), policies 7.4 , 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2016) and Hanger Hill (Haymills) Estate Conservation Area Management Plan and Design Guide.

| Detailed drawings of the replacement front door shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any part of the development is commenced, and this condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with these approved details.

Reason: To ensure that the development harmonises with the character and appearance of the dwelling and would preserve the special character and appearance of the Hanger Hill (Haymills Estate) Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012), policies D1, D2, D4 and HCi of the Draft New London Plan (2019) and policies 7.4 , 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2016)
